title: Jeffrey Epstein’s Former Pilot Recalls Flying Trump, Clinton, Celebrities
sub_head: Pilot testified in the trial of Ghislaine Maxwell that the socialite was intricately involved in Epstein’s daily life
body:
British socialite Ghislaine Maxwell was intricately involved in Jeffrey Epstein’s daily life, managing household staff, taking care of his horses and flying with the disgraced financier on a private plane that flew former presidents and other celebrities, a pilot testified in federal court Tuesday.
“Ms. Maxwell was number 2,” the pilot, Larry Visoski, testified on the second day of the trial. He said Epstein was number one.
